segments.text: Iâ€™m looking through the open window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden appears so peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a lovely path and some low, tidy bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a stark contrast to the scene unfolding inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior makes the internal chaos seem even more pronounced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one outside could possibly guess what's happening in here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is oblivious to the overflowing sink and the mischievous children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how serene the world outside seems.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it quite frustrating that she can't see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking a fall for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a pleasant day outside, yet potential disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really makes you think about what goes on behind closed doors.
segments.speaker: PAR
